mapper.sql: t_house_design_model.id, t_house_design_model.house_type AS houseType, t_house_design_model.house_type_picture AS houseTypePicture, t_house_design_model.vr_picture AS vrPicture, t_house_design_model.area AS area, t_house_design_model.hall_width AS hallWidth, t_house_design_model.hall_sub_width AS hallSubWidth, t_house_design_model.hall_length AS hallLength, t_house_design_model.hall_french_window_width AS hallFrenchWindowWidth, t_house_design_model.hall_french_window_hight AS hallFrenchWindowHight, t_house_design_model.dining_room_width AS diningRoomWidth, t_house_design_model.dining_room_length AS diningRoomLength, t_house_design_model.first_room_width AS firstRoomWidth, t_house_design_model.first_room_length AS firstRoomLength, t_house_design_model.first_room_doorwall_width AS firstRoomDoorwallWidth, t_house_design_model.first_room_window_width AS firstRoomWindowWidth, t_house_design_model.first_room_window_sub_width AS firstRoomWindowSubWidth, t_house_design_model.first_room_window_hight AS firstRoomWindowHight, t_house_design_model.second_room_width AS secondRoomWidth, t_house_design_model.second_room_length AS secondRoomLength, t_house_design_model.second_room_doorwall_width AS secondRoomDoorwallWidth, t_house_design_model.second_room_window_width AS secondRoomWindowWidth, t_house_design_model.second_room_window_sub_width AS secondRoomWindowSubWidth, t_house_design_model.second_room_window_hight AS secondRoomWindowHight, t_house_design_model.third_room_width AS thirdRoomWidth, t_house_design_model.third_room_length AS thirdRoomLength, t_house_design_model.third_room_doorwall_width AS thirdRoomDoorwallWidth, t_house_design_model.third_room_window_width AS thirdRoomWindowWidth, t_house_design_model.third_room_window_sub_width AS thirdRoomWindowSubWidth, t_house_design_model.third_room_window_hight AS thirdRoomWindowHight, t_house_design_model.fourth_room_width AS fourthRoomWidth, t_house_design_model.fourth_room_length AS fourthRoomLength, t_house_design_model.fourth_room_doorwall_width AS fourthRoomDoorwallWidth, t_house_design_model.fourth_room_window_width AS fourthRoomWindowWidth, t_house_design_model.fourth_room_window_sub_width AS fourthRoomWindowSubWidth, t_house_design_model.fourth_room_window_hight AS fourthRoomWindowHight
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_design_model.* FROM t_house_design_model WHERE t_house_design_model.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_design_model.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_design_model
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_design_model.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.house_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.houseType},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.house_type_picture LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.houseTypePicture},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.hall_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.hallWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.hall_sub_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.hallSubWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.hall_length LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.hallLength},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.hall_french_window_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.hallFrenchWindowWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.hall_french_window_hight LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.hallFrenchWindowHight},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.dining_room_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.diningRoomWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.dining_room_length LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.diningRoomLength},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.first_room_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.firstRoomWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.first_room_length LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.firstRoomLength},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.first_room_doorwall_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.firstRoomDoorwallWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.first_room_window_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.firstRoomWindowWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.first_room_window_sub_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.firstRoomWindowSubWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.first_room_window_hight LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.firstRoomWindowHight},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.second_room_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.secondRoomWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.second_room_length LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.secondRoomLength},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.second_room_doorwall_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.secondRoomDoorwallWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.second_room_window_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.secondRoomWindowWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.second_room_window_sub_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.secondRoomWindowSubWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.second_room_window_hight LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.secondRoomWindowHight},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.third_room_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.thirdRoomWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.third_room_length LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.thirdRoomLength},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.third_room_doorwall_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.thirdRoomDoorwallWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.third_room_window_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.thirdRoomWindowWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.third_room_window_sub_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.thirdRoomWindowSubWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.third_room_window_hight LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.thirdRoomWindowHight},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.fourth_room_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fourthRoomWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.fourth_room_length LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fourthRoomLength},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.fourth_room_doorwall_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fourthRoomDoorwallWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.fourth_room_window_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fourthRoomWindowWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.fourth_room_window_sub_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fourthRoomWindowSubWidth},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.fourth_room_window_hight LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fourthRoomWindowHight},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_design_model.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
